group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The TGS subjects were originally consented to participate in the IRB-approved Total Cancer Care® (TCC) at Moffitt. The work described in this manuscript used existing de-identified data from the TCC study, was reviewed by the Moffitt Protocol Support office, and determined not to be human subjects research. The TCGA subject data was accessed via the dbGAP project #7654.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
